goal.ch: This is a graduate course about statistical physics. Emphasis will be on the recent development in statistical physics in the past several decades.
goal.en: This is a graduate course about statistical physics. Emphasis will be on the recent development in statistical physics in the past several decades.

outline.ch:
1. Phase Transitions: Mean Field Theories, Ginzburg Landau theory, Ising model,
2.Critical Phenomena: critical exponents, universality and scaling, Renormalization group
3. Cluster Expansion and Classical Fluids: Mayer expansion, density functional theory, Ornstein-Zernike equation
4.Non-Equilibrium Statistical Mechanics: Kinetic theory, H-theorem, Transport theory, Boltzmann equation, Fluctuation-dissipation theorem, Fokker-Planck equation, Langevin Equation
5. Stochastic thermodynamics, Fluctuation Relations
outline.en:
1. Phase Transitions: Mean Field Theories, Ginzburg Landau theory, Ising model,
2.Critical Phenomena: critical exponents, universality and scaling, Renormalization group
3. Cluster Expansion and Classical Fluids: Mayer expansion, density functional theory, Ornstein-Zernike equation
4.Non-Equilibrium Statistical Mechanics: Kinetic theory, H-theorem, Transport theory, Boltzmann equation, Fluctuation-dissipation theorem, Fokker-Planck equation, Langevin Equation
5. Stochastic thermodynamics, Fluctuation Relations
